snippet: The Obama inaugural committee is struggling to enlist corporate donors to help toward its $50 million goal.
abstract: Pres Obama’s inaugural committee is at least $10 million short of its $50 million fund-raising goal; committee is struggling to bring in corporate money after Obama's announcement that he would accept contributions from businesses.
lead_paragraph: The Obama inaugural committee is struggling to enlist corporate donors to help toward its $50 million goal.

headline.main: Fund-Raising Is Lagging, So Far, for Inaugural Plans
headline.print_headline: Fund-Raising Is Lagging, So Far, for Inaugural Plans
